name: convo-verse
author: Sumith-Kumar-Saini
description: ConvoVerse is an AI-powered chat system using Gemini 2.0 Flash, built with the MERN stack. It features real-time messaging, JWT authentication, Redis session management, and room management for dynamic and interactive communication.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace client" "npm run dev --workspace server"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --workspace client" "npm run build --workspace server"
